The zion canyon shuttle starts at the visitor center. It travels up the zion canyon scenic drive for access to the park's most popular hiking trails when shuttles are operating, the zion canyon scenic drive is only accessible by shuttle buses, pedestrians, and bicycles. If you choose to ride a bike on the road, you must follow standard road safety rules and pull over and stop on the side of the road to allow shuttles to pass safely.
